search_patterns.notes: Pure rendering benchmark (no HTTP). Real latency dominated by API call ~150-200ms

get_pattern.notes: Pure rendering benchmark (no HTTP). Real latency dominated by API call ~80-150ms

markdown_rendering.notes: Pure rendering cost for variable result sizes (1-3 patterns)

estimated_e2e_latency.notes: Estimates include ~150-200ms HTTP API latency (not cached, no keep-alive)

identified_bottlenecks: No HTTP connection reuse (each request creates new connection)
No in-flight deduping for concurrent identical requests
No pattern result caching (MCPCacheService exists but unused)
Full markdown rendering for every search (even if cached)
